titles.title: Increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of S. Con. Res. 70, H.J. Res. 92 is considered passed House.
Received in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 770.

bill.summary: 6/5/2008--Introduced. Increases the statutory limit on the public debt from $9.815 trillion to $10.615 trillion.
